website_summaries.verdict: Although it can leave some consumers feeling warm after a while, this pillow offers a great deal of comfort and support for the neck and shoulders.
pros: Caters to anyone seeking ultimate neck and shoulder support thanks to its renowned therapeutic design
cons: Tends to get hot after a while due to thicker cover material

customer_reviews.title: Best of all I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these. Of the several iterations of neck support pillows I have tried, this is the best one. (The ones that failed the test were either too stiff or bulky, causing my neck to hyper-extend, or too floppy and didn't provide enough support.) The memory foam is outstanding quality. After a year of daily use (because I have to sleep with it), the foam has held up and continues to give consistent, comfortable support. I wash the cover weekly, and it has also held up beautifully. I just purchased a second one, and I can't tell any difference between the brand-new and the year-old pillow. Worth the extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Winner - Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I had to think about it purchasing this pillow for awhile as the price is higher than many travel pillows, but it is worth every penny. I'm even thinking about buying a spare in case I lose this one! It is soft and comfortable but has enough firmness that my neck feels supported. I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cervical Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I use the travel cushion at home watching tv in my recliner and in bed before dozing off for the night, I take it with me when I go to the Dentist to support my neck/shoulders. I had cervical spinal cord surgery last August, this is a very soft and comfy cervical pillow, I plan to buy another one! The cover has a zipper so you can machine wash the cover and the the cover also has an elastic handle for easy carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so simple but the memory foam interior is amazingly supportive and comfortable. I've tried many different kinds and I've never experienced one that is so comfortable. I have neck problems and I have to be well supported without too much pressure on my neck. This pillow is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pillow talk
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was smaller than I thought it would be, but, the saying, " good things come in small packages", truly fits the description to this pillow. I love everything about it to the beautiful blue color, the hidden zipper for easy-off, easy-on cleaning and the cushioning functions. I enjoy it for traveling and I use it while on my computer and especially while I read, which I do a lot of. I would recommend this to anyone who feels the need for additional neck support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pillow.  Helped greatly with neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making such a great pillow. I sustained injuries to my neck long ago and as a result, neck alignment is often stressed while napping flat on a bed - hence I wake up with pain or a headache. I inverted your pillow so the cushion supports my neck and the "handles" curve around my head creating a cradle-effect, allowing a slight elevation to the head. The result is my neck is properly-aligned and the muscles get relaxed. I wish I had had this pillow years ago. It is soft, very well made. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: NFV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, not as comfortable as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and easy to clean as there is a zipper that you can unzip to take off the outer fabric. But, It may be the size of the pillow (thickness), it does not rest well with my neck for an extended period of time over 30 minutes. I think if there was a way to secure the pillow (perhaps like a ribbon at the end to tie it) and if thickness was teensy bit less, it would be good. Also to add on, since it has a sturdy shape and it is not deflate blessed or small, it does take up some room during traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome neck pillow! Just used it on an 8 hr trip from ca to pa. The memory foam has the right amount of "cushion" to rest my head on without compomising the "alignment" for my neck...I usually have a sore neck with other memory foam pillows, but i think it has to do with the memory foam , being too soft, but with this one I did not get off the plane with a sore neck! It also works well with over the ear headphones! Great pillow, I would recommend this pillow to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This travel pillow is extremely comfortable, the memory foam returns to its original shape after each use, and the washable cover is an added plus. I didn't even realize that this pillow had a 5-year manufacturer guarantee until after it arrived. I purchased it for use at home, but plan to take it on my next flight since it's so lightweight and compactable (a much better alternative to the inflatable travel pillow I purchased in the past for flights).
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time finding a good neck pillow. It needs to be soft but supportive, but not too hard. This one checks all the boxes. The memory foam is squishy enough to be comfortable but firm enough that it doesn’t lose shape. It’s not too thick, which I had found with previous neck pillows. Overall very pleased that I went with this model. A little bit more expensive than some others but I think it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Support
customer_reviews.text: Provides very good support for someone who has neck problems. Had brain surgery about a year ago and my neck kills me sometimes when sitting upright for long periods of time. I spend a lot of time in front of a computer monitor and needed support for my neck. I use it for mostly that. It's soft, cushiony, and provides great support. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heraldo

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my mother-in-law in the nursing home ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother-in-law in the nursing home and she loves it. It gives her all the support she needs while spending many hours in bed. I was a little concerned that it might be too thick for her, but it's not. She loves the lavender color.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The stap is very flimsy and stretches very easily to point it becomes unusable
customer_reviews.text: The stap is very flimsy and stretches very easily to point it becomes unusable.I had to cut my sons off for him.the pillow is good.defly for smaller people.I'm not big but not little either and it wouldn't fit me.fits my 9yr old perfectly.very soft and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Oates

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am currently traveling right now for 3 weeks and have used this pillow for 11 days, and today I found that there is a giant hole in it. Really disappointed that it broke this quickly because it was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price and unable to get a prepaid shipping label for my REFUND
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DB Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Love my pillow and my pillow loves me ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this neck pillow a few years now and it has held up very well. I’ve traveled with it, it’s gotten me thru some tough sleep times from being ill. It’s great to hug when you need to hug something while you sleep. The foam has held up perfectly and the cover is easy to remove to wash. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchie

customer_reviews.title: Returned it - too hard
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be comfortable if one used it sitting up. I wanted to sleep on it to keep my head from turning and it was too hard for that. It's about the consistency of a Tempurpedic pillow, maybe more compressed because of the size. I would not call it soft by any means. So gave it a 3 because of my use of it. If you want a foam that compresses and is sturdy, this would be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: not given

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck pillow. I use it when I want neck support while sitting / napping :-) in my recliner. It’s memory foam in a super, super soft cover and it conforms just where it’s needed. Definitely would purchase again or recommend to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: No fairy dust
customer_reviews.text: I took this pillow on a trip to Thailand, 26 hours one way. It is supportive, seems well built, comfortable, and probably a bit better than a cheap airport pillow. Some people totally rave about the pillow. I'm not sure if I was expecting more, but I didn't feel like raving or anything after the trip. In fact, I wasn't even going to comment, but the seller sent me a reminder requesting for feedback, so here it is. It works, is a decent pillow, and you will probably get the same results with any other popular pillow. Don't expect it to whisk you off to dream land with its fairy dust, as I got very little sleep both ways.
customer_reviews.author: M. OLSON

customer_reviews.title: A long rip on inside of pillow after having less than a month. Wasted my money...😒
customer_reviews.text: Tried to upload pic but phone won't let me. Haven't had this neck pillow a month & the outer cloth is ripped up the middle where u lay your head. Haven't used it THAT much to incur such a tear so must be cheap fabric. I already made a review earlier right after I bought this but am changing my review because something new shouldn't be ripping down the middle. I could've for a better one @ Wal-Mart. Damn. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Vito

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, some reviews said this was a firm pillow which is why I got it. Way too soft. But that’s not the issue. I’ve had this inexplicably expensive pillow for 5 days and the thing already has a tear in it. I haven’t even been using it because of the softness of it. It just bursts open from existing. Terrible, terrible quality product. How it got so many good reviews, I’ll never know
customer_reviews.author: Amberleigh Geremia

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the pillow
customer_reviews.text: I received the pillow promptly and I was pleased with the feel of the fabric covering, as well as the pillow itself. I have use it twice now, once when I knew I was going to take a nap in a chair one rainy afternoon, and again when I had awakened with a stiff neck one morning. I used the pillow that night and found it had relieved the worst of the stiff neck symptoms . . . I rarely give anything a 5- star rating for anything, so a 4-star rating is a high rating for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bargain on sale if it doesn't do what it promises
customer_reviews.text: I waited what seemed like ages for this pillow to arrive because I thought it would be comfortable support for my neck. Instead, it is too firm. There is nothing comfortable about it and it grasps my neck in a vice. Used it for about fifteen minutes before putting it on a closet shelf. The word "comfort" should not be in the name of this product. NOTE to "The Crafty World Guys" who keep asking for my feedback on this pillow. THIS IS IT!
customer_reviews.author: British Mystery Buff

customer_reviews.title: Very squishy pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow, while nice outside fabric, has not much in the way of stuffing. It is too squishy and actually feels just like the ones I have found in other stores for, at the most, $10. To say I was disappointed that I paid almost $30 for a pillow I could have purchased for $10 or less, is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Italy. I love that it is memory foam. My daughter used it on the plane and on the trains. I sleep with a memory foam pillow at home. So far, the pillows in Italy leave a lot to de desired. Really flat! So I've been using this travel pillow at night too! Saved me from some major neck pain! It is a bummer that it doesn't fold up any way, but I've been using the elastic strap around my suitcase handle and it hasn't been a problem. I expect it will wash well, but if it doesn't, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: It feels like memory foam covered in velvet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my aunt to use while sleeping in her wheel chair. She loves it. It feels like memory foam covered in velvet. Thickness is just right.
customer_reviews.author: texaskopy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The pillow arrived well packaged and on time. I got it to use for napping in my chair. I haven't had but 1 opportunity to use it yet, but it feels really good around my neck and prevents the neck cramping I got while napping without it. I look forward to more chances to se it!
customer_reviews.author: dinahcat

customer_reviews.title: Good neck support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use when travelling but I find that I use it every day. It is perfect for sitting up in bed without leaning against the hard headboard. I also use it when I meditate, it keeps my head up and comfortable. It's easy to move it around and lean your head sidewaysbecause it has enough firmness without being too hard. I'm very happy with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: starcooks

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and at home!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a paraplegic and sometimes has to lie back in our van while I drive. We got this to help keep his neck supported and avoid headaches. It works great for that! He has also found that it helps in bed when he sleeps on his back, so we keep it on the bedpost, hanging by its luggage strap. It has made more travel possible since he can comfortably rest while we're en route, and he's sleeping better at home, too. We would recommend this for anyone who needs extra neck support. It's firm but not too firm (in our opinion) and very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: jambrillhart

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hold my head in position to see my television when fully reclined in my recliner .It works great ,it's comfortable. although can become a little hot around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hoey

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is the best neck pillow. I travel for work every 2 weeks and this thing saves me while on the red eye. I also use it while at home reading, so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, not firm, poor support.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish it was firmer, it turns to mush unfortunately but if I try to bunch it up it’ll kind of hold heavier. I use it to sleep with not travel as I like the neck support in bed but I wish they had a firmer one.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a long flight and was pleasantly surprised how much I like this pillow. In fact, I sometimes use this when lounging around the house. If you decide to get these, youl will find moving them up or down, left or right just a little gives a whole different experience.
customer_reviews.author: William M

customer_reviews.title: Two different opinions
customer_reviews.text: I can only rate this at 3 stars, reason being as follows. I purchased two pillows, one for me and one for my spouse. Mine worked well enough for me, was both soft and comfortable. Not so much for my husband, as he tried to use it in several different positions and it never provided any support. Thus, 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna M Creasy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable; great support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable; great support; velvety fabric. I actually do not travel, but use this to help alleviate/prevent neck/shoulder/upper back pain when reading, watching TV, and even when resting/napping.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Was As Hard As A Rock!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow I received did not mold to my body. It was so hard that I wonder if it is possible I received a defective pillow. I have had other pillows which were made to conform to my neck and they did so. While the price was good, what I received was hard as a rock. Unfortunately needed to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Charles

customer_reviews.title: feels so soft
customer_reviews.text: at first thought way too small but in using it I found it to be a perfect size. I use it while sitting in chair reading for support of my neck, after having bone graft surgery in neck last year I needed a little something for extra support and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dungan

customer_reviews.title: Love it. So soft, comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone in a nursing home that uses a wheel chair. I tested it and it's so soft, comfortable and supportive. Its not just a great gift. I'm going to get one too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool in awkward sleep positions.
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is somewhat thicker than I expected, but used as a 'halo' type pillow, I have it comfortable while I'm recovering in a rehab facility that uses hospital beds. I hope to use it later at home for naps when I can't get into a recliner with my heavy brace.
customer_reviews.author: sharon g

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the most comfortable neck pillow I have ever bought. Way better than any I have ever purchased in an airport. Helped me to sleep comfortably on my 17hr flight without getting knots in my neck. Only downfall is that because it is memory foam it does not compact very small for stowing away
customer_reviews.author: Saoirse

customer_reviews.title: Made my journey much more comfortable and helped elieviate back pain
customer_reviews.text: I used the pillow on a road trip to Dallas from Chicago on which I was very sick with stomach flu. Made my journey much more comfortable and helped elieviate back pain. Unfortunately the pillow has split at the inner neck seam. It's not even a month old :( *update* the company emailed me within a few hours of my review and sent me a new pillow. I agreed with them, it was probably just a faulty pillow. In a society where companies just don't care, it was refreshing for a company to care enough about their product and customer to reach out and make it right. I'm very happy with my pillow and extremely impressed with Crafty World
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: the customer support has been excellent in trying to satisfy me for my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Finally took this on my long awaited transatlantic flight and felt that it was too small, almost made for a child. It stopped just under my chin. Ended up not using it. Had it been larger or longer and softer-even for memory foam, it would have gotten a 5 star rating. However, the customer support has been excellent in trying to satisfy me for my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfy as I had expected judging from other reviews ... BUT ... having written that as you can see the company contacted me and expressed concern. I have to say that the issue is not the quality or craftsmanship of the pillow. There is a gap that isn't comfortable for my particular neck in my particular car. I would still recommend it and like that the band that helps hold it in place if the headrest is down. The company's concern for my satisfaction raised my rating a notch to 5 STARS. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Unuseable
customer_reviews.text: While it is nice and thick, that is why I can't use it. I felt like I was being choked. It came up past my earlobe. Also no way to attach to purse or luggage. I did crochet a loop and attached a button. I used it on my armrest to cushion my elbow.
customer_reviews.author: rlt

customer_reviews.title: The flaw in this, IMO, is putting the ...
customer_reviews.text: The flaw in this, IMO, is putting the seam in the MIDDLE but also making it a very thick seam and further, the outer fabric should be of a type that stretches or else that seam is going to remain a bulge and the fabric will be tight instead of giving. I don't know... I had the same prob with one I just got yesterday from Wally World so I will have to do some alteration to it myself.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping, a little annoying to carry
customer_reviews.text: This was really comfortable. I had a really cheap one before with beads in it, but this has memory foam and is really comfortable. I bought for a trip with a 10 hour plane ride, so this did the trick. Only downside - it was cumbersome to haul around the airport (since it just has an elastic band for carrying). I wish it had a snap or something so I could put it on most anything, or a carrying bag. But for comfort for sleeping...5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect thickness for both my husband and myself to support our necks. Love the memory foam - just soft enough but not overly squishy! And a very plush and soft fabric covering!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Horribly Designed
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap and horribly designed. It offers no support and is so wide, doesn’t even hug around your neck properly. It’s terrible. Please save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Zanoni

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this neck pillow!! It's soft, comfy, and provides great support. Love I can wash the cover. I've had it at least a year and it's still great. The only thing I would like it to have is a button at the front to connect both ends when I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Neck cushion is very comfortable and offers great neck support
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow is very well made and is filled with firm materials for maximum neck support. I suffer from lots of neck pain and this pillow helps immensely with relieving lots of this discomfort. I highly recommend this pillow. You won't be sorry you purchased this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is soft but firm, the cover is plush (a big plus for me), and I can use it several different ways.
customer_reviews.author: birdflower

customer_reviews.title: nice but with flaws
customer_reviews.text: It is nicely made but is too long for me- it comes almost all the way around my neck. The cover is nice but it says it needs to be handwashed. Had I known that I would not have bought it. With all the machine washable materials today I expected to be able to throw it in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L. Waun

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but wrong for me.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I returned the pillow. It is well made and has a soft velvety fabric cover. I have some neck issues and it was a bit on the firm side for me plus maybe I have a short neck but the ends of the pillow pushed up on both my cheeks which I found uncomfortable. I am giving 4 stars since the return was easy and refund was speedy, so great customer service. Based on all the good reviews I can't fault the pillow, it was just not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Husband gives this pillow ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. Helps with his neck & back pain. Advised by doctor to order him a U shaped neck pillow to try. Very comfortable! Great pillow! Got a less expensive one and it’s not nearly as good.
customer_reviews.author: busybusymom

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this neck pillow for sleeping on the recliner couch & I love it! It's perfect....stays in place even when I turn on my side. I haven't tried it in the car yet but I think it would be great for traveling. I haven't cleaned the cover yet so can't comment on that part.
customer_reviews.author: DobeLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I hoped for! I'm using it almost every day, but not on my neck. I have an uncomfortable bursitis on the bottom of my bottom, or ischium. I'm getting great relief, using it like a better quality hemorrhoid pillow. Thank you, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: kboomer46

customer_reviews.title: Durable neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: It's a good durable one. I've had a few and usually they lose their shape or start to deflate a bit. This one has been through the ringer and still looks brand new. I crammed it into my over stuffed suitcase expecting it to be trash at the end of the trip but it bounces right back to its original shape over and over. Perhaps a little too well though. It's a little big and stiff, but serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Shmenyon

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not used this travel pillow much yet, it seems to be of good quality. It was not as comfortable as I thought it would be, at first. It seemed tight around my neck and I think the material could make the neck area very warm, but after using it for an hour or so I started to adjust to it. I have had other pillows which did not seem as supportive as this one. I think it will prove to be a good travel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Maglio

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is larger than most so provides good support. The memory foam is comfortable but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is larger than most so provides good support. The memory foam is comfortable but it does get hot! If it were not for that it would be a winner. Also no carry strap. No strap and the hot factor knocks it down to three stars.
customer_reviews.author: ColoCyn

customer_reviews.title: SOLVES MY PROBLEM!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully! I have a cyst on the back of my head which becomes very painful when I'm sleeping. This pillow helps me get a good nights sleep until I can deal with the cyst through surgery. I figured that I would need it for a while after the surgery too. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Toni in Cinci

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a life-saver as I've just had eye surgery and have been required to keep my head raised and still. This C collar is comfortable, made well, and has served me well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Domestic

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It’s not firm at all. Nothing like the description. It’s very squishy and flimsy. I’m not satisfied at all. If i didn’t throw the boxes away already I would send it back
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is fantastic with this company. The pillow is made with quality. However, for me, It was too thick and too slippery. It kept sliding all around my neck. There is no odor at all with this pillow and it does go back in shape after use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria5131

customer_reviews.title: Good review
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend who had a neck issue. She loves it and is very happy to have it. Soon, I will buy one for myself. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Bee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but warm
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but also very warm. I bought it because of the gel cooling. It’s not cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while nursing in the middle of the night. I need to sit up, so having a comfy neck pillow is a must. Wish I had bought this sooner. Very comfy. I thought it would be too stiff or too big, but it is the perfect size. My husband did try it quickly and judged it too stiff. I do wish that the ends stayed closer together while wearing, but it's a small issue. I like that it has a removable cover, although I haven't had to wash it yet.
customer_reviews.author: E. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his trip back East. He said it was fantastic and used it the whole time traveling. I also appreciate the communication regarding tips for use/cleaning/etc from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: This travel pillow is wonderful. It is super soft and flexible
customer_reviews.text: This travel pillow is wonderful. It is super soft and flexible, but yet firm enough to keep your head from moving and falling to the side. I love this! It comes in many colors which I love and the light purple was of course my favorite color so I was one happy person to see it came in this nice lavendar color. The plush microfiber/suede type of cover over the pillow is great. This is the most comfortable travel pillow around!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then I thought!!
customer_reviews.text: It's good but it's smaller then I thought it would be but comfortable and soft yes.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow frequently. It is soft and comfortable. Will eventually buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: tazajo

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. I thought the material was really soft
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow on a flight from Dallas, TX to Japan. I liked it. I thought the material was really soft, and the squishy nature of the pillow was comfortable. I think it needs slightly more support around the neck for it to be the perfect pillow. I ended up using it mostly in the hotel rooms as an alternate pillow because I only got one pillow at the hotel. Good overall, though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME STILL AFTER 2 YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pillow for the past 2 years and it is THE BEST! I use it all the time whether I want to take a nap on the couch or during long car rides! The microfiber pillow case has a zipper and you're able to take it off and wash it on delicate. The pillow itself is made out of memory foam and has not lost its shape! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erica*3995

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is comfortable and cozy and is very easy to pack. The customer service is even better. I have been in contact with the customer service department this past week and they really care about their products! Any question I had they were very quick to respond and friendly. Worth it! Not a bad price either as I was searching for the right neck pillow for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great travel pillow! Just used it on a trip and the material is very soft and comfortable. High quality construction and easy to clean outer cover a major plus. Very versatile...can be used as a neck pillow or to sit on as a doughnut.
customer_reviews.author: B Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!  Fantastic pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really is the world's most comfortable neck/travel pillow. I got one for myself, and my 7 and 12 year-olds fought over who would get to borrow this thing. Now they both have this thing on their Amazon wish lists! This is definitely worth every penny. It may cost a little more than similar products, but it is worth every penny. I haven't experienced a pillow that even came close to this comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yardley Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item. We've had several different types of travel ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. We've had several different types of travel pillows over the years and this is simply the best. We don't use them for travel, just while reading, watching TV and using a laptop. Also, the wife uses hers while she is in the dentist's chair. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice support
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of herniated discs in my neck and ordered the pillow for extra support for my neck while driving. So far the pillow works great. It is not too soft and compresses the right amount for my needs and offers good support without being too firm.. Build quality is good and outer fabric a nice thickness. The zip off cover is a nice option for cleaning. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MJH@62

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much your basic neck pillow. This one is firmer and seems to last longer than other and neck pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Chickens a dime

customer_reviews.title: Case ripped
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. Very very comfortable but the case came apart about 5 inches. Just missed return window
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfy, sturdy, and easily washable!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using my travel pillow for the two weeks that I was traveling because it ended up being much more comfortable than the pillows provided where I stayed at. I traveled with my mother and she actually ended up using it more than I did because of how extremely comfortable and relaxing it is.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: A saving grace!
customer_reviews.text: I have had neck pain for years. Sitting at a computer all day causes many issues and one is neck stiffness. I had trouble sleeping and could not get comfortable. Every pillow I have had did not help....until his one! It gives the right amount of support and alows me to sleep pain free! I wish I had found this years ago. My neck feels better than it has in years because I am getting some rest.
customer_reviews.author: Debm

customer_reviews.title: Neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and, compared to other similar pillows I have tried, more comfortable. I also like the fact that it is slightly smaller than most such pillows.....the smaller size making it more convenient to haul around. I am very satisfied with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used the pillow yet. We are leaving on our trip Saturday, when I will be using it. I think it will be perfect! The cover is very soft & fits close to my neck which is great. We have a Tempurpedic bed, so I know the memory foam will be wonderful. The pillow is well made & just what I wanted--thank you for a well designed pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the pillow was wonderful on our flight
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was bought for my mom who suffers with RA in her neck, the pillow was wonderful on our flight. She said she also uses it while she reads and watches TV. Thank you for this great product
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Overall nicely made. But the pillow is quite hard. Definitely not suitable for air travel. the pillow pushes the neck away from the seat, creating a very uncomfortable position. The only comfortable position is to hang your head forward, resting the chin on the pillow. Overall, definitely not for long air travel.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: A neck pillow that really gives you support!
customer_reviews.text: Due to serious neck problems I have been trying to find a neck pillow that actually had some support....Well I found it. As a matter of fact, my mother who also suffers from neck problems took it over. I am now ordering a second pillow to hopefully keep for myself. We will use these not only for plane travel but for everyday watching TV or for my mom, riding in the car. Thank you for such an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Poofs

customer_reviews.title: A little over priced
customer_reviews.text: Nice small pillow , the ends of the pillow hits the sides of your face, but it’s ok. A LITTLE OVER PRICED THOUGH!
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is too soft to offer the support I was looking for. However, it seems to be good quality, the microfiber is soft and comfortable, and I really appreciate the fact that it can be easily removed for washing. The pillow is lightweight and easy to carry; the elastic strap that allows the pillow to be attached to luggage is a very useful feature. If it had a touch more support, it'd be the perfect travel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Tylla Wolf

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the weary traveler
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a gift for my brother who travels a lot. He used it in his flight to England and had rave reviews. I have another brand of travel pillow and my brother has used that one in the past. His response was after comparing the two, "where has this travel pillow been all of my life? " ever since, he has been using it for when he is at home and needs a rest from staying at a computer. I may purchase one as a gift for myself. Shipping was prompt and, as iterated before, put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: ADeJoseph

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow. Wish it had a little more support. Good to travel with. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ls

customer_reviews.title: Take measurements
customer_reviews.text: It is SO Comfortable. I had been looking for a pillow just like that. My only advice is to measure the height of your neck and the pillow before buying, then determine whether the pillow's height is perfect for your neck, or not.
customer_reviews.author: Radwan Hassan Sulaimani

customer_reviews.title: Good price and product for certain necks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this pillow, but it just wasn't as described. It was uncomfortable for my neck. The material is good, washable, zip-off cover, nice handle to attach to luggage. The pillow was well packaged and sent very quickly (2-days). They also took it back without question when I said it wasn't what I expected from the description.
customer_reviews.author: gtodan

customer_reviews.title: Zero support (too thin and collapses instantly)
customer_reviews.text: This pillow provides zero support. I might as well not have a pillow at all. First of all, it is very thin. What makes it worse is that the memory foam is very weak and collapses as soon as you rest your head on it. These factors combine to make for a very unsupportive pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it yet for travel but I have used it at home and I really like it. The cover is soft and removable so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for a long train trip I am taking next month. I haven't used it yet for travel but I have used it at home and I really like it. The cover is soft and removable so it can be washed. The pillow itself is comfortable and doesn't leave me with a sore neck. I will have to take this on all my trips.
customer_reviews.author: Lintasare

customer_reviews.title: This product did the job.
customer_reviews.text: My neck feels better. I use it when I watch tv and take naps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these and I love them. I only recently started to have chronic ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and I love them. I only recently started to have chronic neck pain and these have alleviated the pain so much especially when I watch TV or read. I also sometimes use to sleep. They are soft yet provide great support.
customer_reviews.author: FNLrox

customer_reviews.title: Use after ear surgery
customer_reviews.text: The pillow arrived in good time, packaged well. We haven’t used it yet - got it for my husband for when he has ear surgery. A friend recommended it for sleep without pressure on his ear. The cover looks and feels nice, but with the short zipper I’m wondering how hard it will be to get the cover back on after washing.
customer_reviews.author: BV Pat

customer_reviews.title: Like a rock... Still okay though
customer_reviews.text: I hope this pillow gets softer because so far it feels like I'm laying against a rock. I guess I was picturing a very squishy memory foam but this is very very firm. It does its job with neck support though! I give it 4 stars because I mostly blame myself for not realizing what I needed in a neck pillow! It would probably be perfect on an airplane and I love the purple color.
customer_reviews.author: cpuff

customer_reviews.title: Seams came apart after one overseas trip. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled. Seems a bit smaller than purple version ordered before. Wife says the purple version seemed smaller at first also. Will test my blue one on upcoming trip. After one trip from Orlando to Philippines, seams began to come apart. Not Happy
customer_reviews.author: trugs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very comfortable. I tried several different brands and this neck pillow is the best I have found. I use it every evening in my recliner. Would make a perfect gift for travelers or people like me who often fall asleep while watching tv. This product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

product_meta.title: Crafty World Comfort Master Travel Pillow; Get Wrapped in Comfort with Firm Memory Foam - Relax and Sleep Soundly While Traveling, in Office, or at Home - Neck Support for Post-Op Patients
feature_bullets: EVERYONE DESERVES COMFORT FIT FOR ROYALTY. Kiss discomfort and neck pain goodbye! The neck pillow for sleeping is scientifically tested to be the ideal pillow for those suffering from chronic neck, shoulder, or upper back pain

EXPERIENCE LOVE AT FIRST NAP. Sleep peacefully all throughout your flight or journey. The perfect companion for those traveling in planes, cars, trains, buses, and more. It provides optimal neck and shoulder support to give you a more relaxing trip

MAXIMIZE YOUR COMFORT AT HOME OR IN THE OFFICE. This is the perfect travel pillow even for those who don’t travel. The neck pillow is versatile and can be used for extra support when sleeping at night, relaxing at home or working in the office

PROVIDES YOU WITH THE PERFECT FIT EVERYTIME. Created using high quality thermo sensitive memory foam, it easily and comfortably molds to your neck for the perfect fit. It comes with a soft velour removable cover that’s soft to the touch

LIFETIME MANUFACTURER MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. In a very unlikely event where you think that the pillow isn’t the "perfect fit", we offer you a lifetime manufacturer guarantee. Add the Comfort Master Travel Pillow to your cart now and experience extreme comfort fit for royalty
